title: COAST ORB / bunkerthought
description: Maybe a way underground? Maybe sheâ€™s down there?

dialogueTree.title: Visual Calculus: "The light vanishes inside the concr..."
dialogueTree.text: The light vanishes inside the concrete slit. The structure goes deep under the earth.

links.title: Visual Calculus: "There's no echo -- and no answer."
links.text: There's no echo -- and no answer.

links.title: Visual Calculus: "Maybe it's just a storm drain for t..."
links.text: Maybe it's just a storm drain for the sewer?

links.title: You: ""Kim, any idea what's down there?""
Kim Kitsuragi: ""No idea." He takes his glasses off..."
links.text: "No idea." He takes his glasses off to polish. "Could be connected to one of the buildings around here..."

links.title: You: ""Think we might find Ruby down ther..."
links.text: "Think we might find Ruby down there?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""We might find her down *somewhere*..."
links.text: "We might find her down *somewhere* -- there's an old storm drain system beneath Martinaise that's mostly collapsed. Revachol's sewage system has been built and rebuilt four or five times now."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "He puts his glasses back on. "In co..."
links.text: He puts his glasses back on. "In conclusion -- she could be under any building."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "He looks into the slit and sighs. "..."
links.text: He looks into the slit and sighs. "I hope not."
